text: Bill Dubuque is an American screenwriter. He is known for co-creating the Netflix crime drama series Ozark (2017â€“present). His movie credits include The Judge (2014), A Family Man (2016) and The Accountant (2016). In 2017, he scripted an upcoming DC Extended Universe Nightwing movie. Dubuque was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He is married and has three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American television writers Category:Screenwriters from Missouri Category:Writers from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Bill Dubuque
